question: The crime rate nowadays is decreasing compared to the past due to advance technology which can prevent and solve crime. Do you agree or disagree?
text: I definitely agree with the statement that the case rate of all over the countries has been reduced due to the advanced technology machines to compare the past times. There are major changes in the manner of public safety.

In the past times, there were very less discovery in the field of technologies and there were hard to find the criminals without the help of any sources. So that violence increased. People were loosing their lives and the family member did not get a justice as police were unable to catch criminals.

Nowadays, technologies have been developed so well that the security system is needed in every sector. CCTV cameras play the most significant part in the case. Hidden camera has been developed so that sting operation can be done successfully. In the matter of being offensive, the camera plays an important role and by means of the camera, the lawlessness ratio has been prevented at a certain rate. There are some strict rules have been made by the government, so that people afraid of doing the scandal. The security system has been done strictly. To avoid an accident, traffic signals are there, which is a part of protection system too. For instant action, emergency number, a mobile app has been developed, my means of that, people can save their lives and police can reach there on the spot.

At the end, I would like to say that definitely some changes have been done to develop countries and to reduce the case rates. In the mission of violation reduction, the public is cooperating too, which is the biggest power of the nation.
